text: Joshiro Maruyama (born 11 August 1993) is a Japanese judoka. He won a medal at the 2019 World Judo Championships. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male judoka Category:World judo champions Category:Judoka at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Japan Category:Asian Games medalists in judo Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games
title: Joshiro Maruyama
